mapper.select: SELECT e.event_id, e.event_name, e.event_type, e.create_time, d.bind_node_ids, d.bind_node_names, e.impl_type, e.impl_localservice, e.impl_script FROM workflow_event e LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.bind_objid, GROUP_CONCAT(b.node_id) AS bind_node_ids, GROUP_CONCAT(b.node_name) AS bind_node_names FROM workflow_nodebind b WHERE b.def_code = #{bind.defCode} and b.def_version = #{bind.defVersion} and b.bind_type = #{bind.bindType} GROUP BY b.bind_objid) d ON e.event_id = d.bind_objid WHERE d.bind_objid IS NOT NULL ORDER BY e.create_time desc
